zh.title: 以太坊/美元技术分析：[市场震荡整理，略偏空头]
zh.content:
当前以太坊/美元(ETH/USD)在1969.51附近震荡整理，短期内呈现出一定的弱势。价格在昨日的高点1974.99和低点1957.01之间波动，整体未能突破关键支撑或阻力位，市场情绪较为谨慎。

技术面上，MACD目前显示负值（-29.088548），虽然信号线数据缺失，但负值表明短期内卖压较重。此外，SMA(20)在2023.05附近，这为价格提供了一个下行的阻力位，若价格回升至该区域，可能会遇到较强的抛压。

支撑位方面，1957.01是近期的低点，若价格跌破该位置，可能会进一步下探至更低的支撑区间。若市场情绪未能有效恢复，可能会看到价格向下调整。而上方的阻力位则位于1974.99，突破该位有望推动价格进一步反弹。

建议投资者在当前市场情形下保持谨慎。若价格接近支撑位，可考虑短期买入策略，但要设置止损以控制风险；而若价格靠近阻力位，则建议卖出或观望。

en.title: Ethereum vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current price of Ethereum (ETH) against the US Dollar stands at $1969.51, reflecting a slight 0.52% increase over the past 24 hours. This modest uptick suggests market consolidation after a range-bound period. The price has seen a daily high of $1974.99 and a low of $1957.01, indicating a tight trading range. Given the price’s proximity to the $1974 resistance level, Ethereum may encounter difficulty surpassing this barrier unless there is a stronger bullish catalyst.

Ethereum’s trend shows short-term weakness, with the price trading well below the 20-period simple moving average (SMA) of $2023.05. The current level suggests a bearish bias in the medium term. If ETH fails to break above the $1974 resistance level, it could face further downward pressure toward the $1957 support zone. This is a critical area to monitor, as a breach below this support would expose Ethereum to more downside risks, possibly targeting lower levels near $1900.

The MACD is currently negative at -29.088548, indicating that the momentum is on the side of the sellers. Without an available signal line for comparison, the lack of a clear bullish crossover adds to the bearish outlook. Additionally, the absence of a recent RSI reading leaves the relative strength condition unclear, but the negative MACD reading hints at weakening buying pressure. Traders should exercise caution and wait for confirmation of a trend reversal before considering long positions.

For traders, short-term caution is recommended. A decisive break above $1974 could lead to a retest of the $2023 resistance, but until then, maintaining a neutral to bearish stance is prudent. A clean break below $1957 would confirm further downside potential, encouraging short trades. Risk management remains key, as Ethereum could be poised for additional volatility in either direction.
